briefTitle: Effects of Soy Compounds on Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, and Bone Health
officialTitle: Effects of Soy Isoflavones on the Prostate, Breast and Bone
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria

* Scheduled for prostatectomy
* Willing and able to consume study tablets for at least 2 weeks prior to surgery
* Willing to accept random assignment
* Signed informed consent

Exclusion Criteria

* Unwilling to avoid soy intake during the study period
* Currently taking antibiotics
